name: Luminom - An SCP story (v.Scream Jam 2021)
description:
"SCP-8935FR is an alternative dimension out of our universe, located between time and space. The area looks like a classic seabed, but the liquid found in this dimension is absolutely unknown, it seems to bee a varition of kown superfluid mixed with potassium mutation. The entity SCP-8935FR-A is the only intelligent life knowned in this dimension, it’s an antimatter entity composed by anti-hydrogen atoms. All of the agents have to stay away from SCP-8935FR-A at the risk of seeing their body disintegrated. SCP-8935FR-A is attracted by vibrations, every sounds have to be avoid for every member of the staff." 

SCP-8935FR is a non official SCP created specifically for the Scream Jam 2021. It was made in one week.

Read me :
- ZQSD to move
- Control to crouch / go down in water
- Space to jump / go up in water
- Shift to run / Swim faster
- Left click to focus your light
- E to interact / pick up objects
- Tab to read documents picked up / go to next document
- Escape to leave documents

Credits :
- Jérome "Lalou" Thisse : Narrative Design, Game Design and Artistic Direction
- Marina Toussaint : 3D modelisation, texturing and animations
- Camille "Camoll" Tournemolle : 3D modelisation, texturing, animations
- Quentin "Kingou" Carneiro : Game Design, Artistic Direction and Programming support
- Eric Tigano : Level design, Sound Design and Integration
- Gaël "Darnagof" Edern : Programming
